meta_description: Explore Martha’s Vineyard Museum: exhibitions, family programs, and historic collections that connect visitors to the Island’s diverse heritage.
hours_text:
[](https://mvmuseum.org/event/understanding-tick-borne-illness/)

### [Understanding Tick-Borne Illness in an Island Community](https://mvmuseum.org/event/understanding-tick-borne-illness/)

A practical talk led by clinician Aubrey Stimola Ryan exploring tick-borne illnesses, symptoms, prevention, and when to seek care in an Island community.

[READ MORE](https://mvmuseum.org/event/understanding-tick-borne-illness/)

[](https://mvmuseum.org/event/intro-to-mv-history-3/)

### [Introduction to Martha’s Vineyard History Lecture Series, Week 3](https://mvmuseum.org/event/intro-to-mv-history-3/)

If you’ve ever wanted to dig deep into the story of this Island with the help of an expert guide, this six-week lecture series, taught by MVM Research Librarian Bow Van Riper, is the perfect place to begin. From the seismic shifts of European arrival in the 1600s to the modern challenges of the 2020s, each week offers a unique lens on the Island’s evolution. Engage with stories of revolution, prosperity, and transformation as you navigate through centuries of history. 

[READ MORE](https://mvmuseum.org/event/intro-to-mv-history-3/)

[](https://mvmuseum.org/event/inside-19th-century-whaling-logbooks/)

### [Inside 19th-Century Whaling Logbooks](https://mvmuseum.org/event/inside-19th-century-whaling-logbooks/)

Step aboard a 19th-century whaleship through the pages of a whaling logbook. In conversation, MVM Curator of Exhibitions Anna Barber and historian Matthew Stackpole explore the perso...

## ADMISSION

#### INDIVIDUAL ADMISSION

Adults: $21  
Seniors: $18  
Children 7-17: $7  
Children 6 & Under: Free

#### YEAR-ROUND ISLANDER RATES

Adults: $15  
Seniors $12

_MVM members are always free._

[BECOME A MEMBER](https://mvmuseum.org/membership/)

Group rates are available for parties of 10 or more.
